content: I'm planning to upgrade my camera body soon, and I'm thinking of switching to a newer model with better video capabilities. Do you know if there are any specific camera straps that are more suitable for video production, or any features I should look out for? By the way, my newer camera bag has been a game-changer for me - it's so much lighter and easier to carry around than my old one, which I bought from a different brand on February 22nd.
